initBlock.name: Custom Extension Column Display Labels

selectStatements.query:
select UPPER(B.DW_TABLE_NAME)||'_'||UPPER(B.DW_COLUMN_NAME),CASE WHEN A.ENRICHMENT_OBJECT_TYPE='DFF' THEN B.DISPLAY_LABEL ELSE A.AUGMENTATION_NAME||' '||B.DISPLAY_LABEL END from DW_DMD_EXT_TABLES A,DW_TARGET_EXTENSION_MAPPINGS_DFG B
WHERE A.TABLE_NAME=B.DW_TABLE_NAME
UNION
select UPPER(A.TABLE_NAME)||'_'||UPPER(B.DW_COLUMN_NAME),CASE WHEN A.ENRICHMENT_OBJECT_TYPE='DFF' THEN B.DISPLAY_LABEL ELSE A.AUGMENTATION_NAME||' '||B.DISPLAY_LABEL END from DW_DMD_EXT_TABLES A,DW_TARGET_EXTENSION_MAPPINGS_DFG B
WHERE UPPER(A.BASE_TABLE)=UPPER(B.DW_TABLE_NAME)
UNION
select UPPER(A.TABLE_NAME)||'_'||UPPER(B.PHYSICAL_COLUMN),A.AUGMENTATION_NAME||' '||B.PHYSICAL_COLUMN  from DW_DMD_EXT_TABLES A,CONTENT_RPD_PHYSICAL_COLUMN_DETAILS B
WHERE UPPER(A.BASE_TABLE)=UPPER(B.PHYSICAL_TABLE)
